website_summaries.verdict: Brickell was founded in 2014 with men's grooming needs in mind, and this moisturizing lotion is an example of the company's quality and commitment.
pros: Has a lightweight consistency yet does a good job at moisturizing and firming skin
You don't have to use a lot to moisturize your entire face
Made with natural and organic ingredients and doesn't contain anything artificial
cons: Flip-open cap has the tendency to get clogged
Scent is somewhat minty, which may not appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Service Ever!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 2/12/18: I originally gave this product a low rating due to the smell. I didn't know there was an unscented version. The company reached out to me after I posted my review, and made the situation right. They offered me the unscented version (free of charge!). I love the unscented version, and this was probably the best customer service experience ever! Highly recommended! ********* I think this product was an okay moisturizer. I didn’t like the smell. Typically men’s moisturizers have this “woodsy” scent which I’m not a fan of. I’d prefer something with little to no smell. This one had a similar smell, with a faint fishy smell. I’ll be looking for something with a less offensive smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Georgia Greetings

customer_reviews.title: nice lotion but bad bottle
customer_reviews.text: The lotion is nice but the cap is terrible. Constantly dries and gets gunked up. For the price of the product a better dispensing cap would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Stein

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, absorbs quickly, leaves you feeling fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start by saying that I have very sensitive skin - it’s really easy for me to break out if I use the wrong products. I have an oilier complexion, which means few wrinkles, but potential problems elsewhere. I’ve used a TON of different moisturizers with different results - some were too greasy, others didn’t smell good, etc. I found this one on Amazon and figured I’d give it a shot. I’m so glad I did!! It absorbs super quickly, moisturizes so we’ll and smells fantastic - my wife loves the smell too :). I HIGHLY recommend this daily moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: AJK

customer_reviews.title: Best Men's Moisturizer I've Used
customer_reviews.text: I've used a variety of different moisturizer's (Getting older... Gotta to try to beat / keep up with father time) in order to keep my skin looking good. This has been my favorite so far. Makes your face feel nice after you put it on. You only need a little (I put on a pea sized drop), so the 4oz wil last you awhile. I use it in the AM (regardless of whether I shave or not) and also use in conjunction with the eye balm and anti-aging cream at night. So far very happy with the products. Also - check out the free sample offer from their website (you just pay shipping). Good chance to check it out.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic L

customer_reviews.title: Pungent scent upon application and not very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I had to double check the ingredients after using this because I swore I smelled something akin to alcohol, although now that I have read some reviews, others seem to think it it more fishy. In any case, it is disturbing but I will admit that it does not last past that initial application. Secondly, I thought it would be more moisturizing--I found dry patches of skin after applying twice per day, leading me to add an extra ~lotion-like essence into my regimen. Perhaps I got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent smell
customer_reviews.text: Be careful that the smell of this moisturizer is so strong that an average Asian guy like me feel so awful. And I think my friend more sensitive than me cannot smell this moisturizer. Another problem is that they don't have a pump include with it, so I always apply excessive moisturizer on my face. The only thing I like is they are so lightweight and fast absorb in your face so no oily in the face which is great for a "four-eyes" like me. I just it for a few days so this is some of my first impression with this product. Will update in the future.
customer_reviews.author: KenZend

customer_reviews.title: Good face moisturizer to combine with other brickell products!
customer_reviews.text: The face moisturizer is a good product. Of the three Brickell products I own, I think this one is a bit below the wash and the scrub. I have tried other competition's moisturizers and I can say that this one feels a bit thin in comparison to others. Others have a more moisturizing sense to them. Dont get me wrong this one works great, but I think of the 3 products I take a start away from it because of that. The scent is nice, although I sometimes prefer my skin moisturizer to be scentless, not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Cuestas

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes without leaving my face greasy or coated in a cream
customer_reviews.text: I'm liking all of the Brickell products I purchased so far and this is one of what I consider to be the three most important products for daily skin care (i.e. cleanser, toner, moisturizer). It only takes a small dab to cover my face and leaves my face feeling (and smelling) clean and fresh throughout the day. I've noticed since using this moisturizer, along with Brickell's Balancing Toner, that my skin is producing less natural oil in my T-zone and I no longer have that feeling of heavy, oily, grease on my forehead (and it doesn't look shiny). Liking the fresh smell too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T.

customer_reviews.title: Guys, this stuff is for REAL
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several Brickell products, including the face scrub, hand lotion, and this face moisturizer. All of them are top-shelf products - but the face moisturizer is my personal favorite. I've tried several and this is the one I'm sticking with. The consistency is perfect, not too thin and not too gooey. It goes on easy, absorbs quickly, and feels great. The scent is terrific too, not too strong and layers with everything I thrown at it as far as shaving soap, cologne, etc. Most important - it works. My wife noticed the difference, and she notices everything lol! I use it twice a day and I plan to do so for a long time. Great products guys!
customer_reviews.author: Brian K.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, a little goes along way!
customer_reviews.text: I've had sensitive and oily skin for years, and I am now in my mid-thirties and was still occasionally breaking out. I've tried dozens of name brand moisturizers (Cetaphil Neutrogena Nivea Keri CeraVe Aveeno...) They all still would cause me to breakout. This face moisturizer is the perfect blend of natural products that I look forward to using everyday. Most people my age are starting the early wrinkling aging stage. I've been using this lotion for three years and people ask me how I look so young. I tell them I invest in good moisturizer. So glad I found this brand, 3 years ago I switched to all cruelty free products never going back.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Young

customer_reviews.title: A bit minty.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good no breakouts but the fragrance is a bit strong and spearminty. It takes a little getting used to. A little goes a long way - greasy at first but absorbs fine. The smell is tough to stomach tho unless you like it. Kinda lumberjack meets the mint store.
customer_reviews.author: ike_amazon

customer_reviews.title: Weird lotion.  Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Update: I’ve used this for a few weeks now and I have to say, I hate this stuff and I’m mad I spent this much money on the bottle. It smells bad and I’m convenes it actually has made my face drier. I changed to CeraVe cream and it’s 1000x better. Not what I expected. Weird consistency, really strong fragrance that clashes with my cologne and honestly, my face actually feels drier.
customer_reviews.author: BHX

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I was able to try this awhile back and knew I had to have more. Now that I've been using this daily for a few months I can honestly say this is the best moisturizer I've ever used. I thought it was expensive but that's when I thought the bottle would only last a month or so, I still have about 1/4th the bottle and I use this every day. I do wish it had a push top dispenser to better control how much I get each time but I'm getting better at not putting a quarter of the bottle on my hand each time... I'm looking forward to trying other brickell products soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Eli

customer_reviews.title: Great, lightweight moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I had moderate acne and oily skin when I was a teenager so naturally, I was nervous when selecting a moisturizer for my face as an adult! I took a leap of faith and tried out Brickell after seeing the great reviews. The high price tag did make me hesitate at first, but I'm glad I took the chance! I have not had any pimples, clogged pores, or irritation since I've been using Brickell for over a year now! I'd highly recommend it to others who - like me - want to keep their face and skin moisturized, but are fearful of products that may clog your pores.
customer_reviews.author: Jasiel

customer_reviews.title: Very light
customer_reviews.text: Good morning all! In regards to moisturizing, scent and ingredient list, I gave this 5 stars. I gave 4 stars for the overall rating simply because I haven’t used this particular product long enough to give a full assessment. I thoroughly enjoy the lightness of this lotion and so far it’s moisturizing properties. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Myers

customer_reviews.title: Weird stench once applies to face
customer_reviews.text: For starters, its a pretty basic moisturizer. Smells good when you smell it from the bottle. But then once you apply, you have this really bad, some what fishy? type of smell. It kind of reminds me of a time my friend had a dead rat in the glove department. We were wondering what that smell was for weeks. Upon opening the glove department...dead rat that got stuck in the manual book. Yes, this lotion has a hint if that smell once you apply it. I shouldve stayed away after reading others complain about the smell
customer_reviews.author: Simon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Face still dry after use
customer_reviews.text: Two days into using this moisturizer and I do not like it. I use as directed and my face is still dry and flaky minutes afterward. These pictures are AFTER I applied the moisturizer. As you can see my skin is tight and dry and chalky/flaky around my mouth and cheeks. I'm very disappointed. All this product did for me was make my face feel even tighter and smell like lemongrass. I am happy for those it works for but, I will not be buying again. I'd like a refund. Also, the scent is nice enough. I'm just not crazy about it. Two stars because at least it doesn't stink and hasn't made my face breakout.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Premium product, great moisturization, great smell
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of moisturizers over the years, but I keep going back to Brickell, and this one specifically. It goes on easily (soaks in really well, doesn't leave a "wet" layer like many others do (i.e. it is not "heavy"), and actually feels good - like it is moisturizing my skin like it should! Premium product, premium results!
customer_reviews.author: M. Alarky

customer_reviews.title: Actually moisturizes
customer_reviews.text: Something that actually moisturizes and doesn't just feel like it upon initial application. Tried a lot of moisturizers after I realized Cetaphil wasn't cutting it during winter. Most stuff made my face dry out even more or left a residue - one even made me break out which isn't something I've really experienced. Forgot to get unscented but the scent isn't too bad nor is it very strong..has sort of an Earl Grey tea smell to it, not woodsy the way other people described it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice moisturizer that doesn't shine
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of time in front of a web cam, and my biggest annoyance is the shine that many moisturizers result in. The moisturizer from Brickell is nice and light, so it moisturizes without being oily causing a shiny forehead. Two thumbs up. My only feedback would be to improve the packaging. I have the face wash as well, and it has the same dispenser (where you have to squeeze it out). It works with the face wash because it's more watery, but for the moisturizer you really need a better dispenser. I use one of the ones left over from a previous moisturizer. It's nothing with the product though, and highly recommend the moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Lolk

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to use all different kinds of face lotion throughout my life and they must all have the same ingredient that bugs my face because every time I would use other brands my face would turn red and get hot and uncomfortable. This is the first lotion I've tried that doesn't do that. It also doesn't feel thick and gunky when you put it on. The only reason I was even willing to try another face moisturizer is because I had recently ordered other brickel products and loved them. If you have sensitive skin I would definitely give this brand a shot, it is different from the rest!
customer_reviews.author: Spenser

customer_reviews.title: converted skeptic.....  :)
customer_reviews.text: my wife bought me this because my face gets pretty weathered. i'm in Upstate NY and bike to work all year. snow, rain, salt, sun, etc.. i started feeling tightness and irritation on my cheeks, so my wife got me this product. it's great. absorbs quickly, non-greasy, and it has an odor out of the bottle, but nothing lasting. big step up from petroleum based generic creams. i use it every day now. i even cheat and use it on my other problem area, the backs of my hands. highly recommended, nothing negative to say.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gage

customer_reviews.title: Nice light bodied moisturizer for men
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive, dry skin. After using the Brickell face wash at night before bed, I apply the moisturizer. In short, it works. My skin type is so sensitive, in fact, that I cannot use Brickell's eye balm because it makes my eyes "puffy", but the moisturizer is gentle enough that I can use it under my eyes. In my opinion, all of the Brickell products I've used smell good. I recommend this moisturizer for those like me, who have very sensitive, very dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: T. Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: While at first I was skeptical and didn't love the product but as you figure out how to properly apply it then it works nicely. I started to greatly reduce the amount I use on my face and it worked really well. The product is a bit wet, so go easy with it ... you don't need much. Customer service from Brickell was outstanding! As a result I will definitely go with Brickell again, but perhaps a different product. Simply put, not all products are meant for everyone and with their great customer support you can feel at ease to try their products.
customer_reviews.author: DesertKnight

customer_reviews.title: Me like
customer_reviews.text: I was never really a fan of facial moisturizers. But then saw this here on Amazon, with great reviews. I actually bought one and have been using this for more than 2 months now. It is actually great it does get a bit sticky if you're the type of person who sweats a lot. Most especially now that it's summer I highly suggest just put a bit and it will go a long way. It will last the entire day. And yes, I do have sensitive skin. Worked fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: buki

customer_reviews.title: The cream goes a long way just a small amount is good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a year now and I’m 49 years old from what I’m seeing yes it definitely works I use the moisturizer the most I have used the eye cream it’s just I tend to not buy it I think the moisturizer pretty much does everything I don’t have bags under my eyes so the eye cream would be a waste to use at this time but I think I’m going to have to use it eventually !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product all the way.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product now for several months, after trying out a few different facial moisturizers from other brands. I'll be coming back to this one. It works amazingly well, goes on quickly and easily and doesn't leave my face feeling greasy or like I'm wearing a mask. Its amazing how little of this product you need to use, which means even though the bottle is small it will last you a long time. I've gone through other moisturizes much more quickly, so this is a big plus as well. I also like that the scent is not overpowering either, its simply well balanced. All around a great product that I'd recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: Smells annoyingly and Highly overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I actually don't believe in doing experiments with my soft and lovely skin yet I purchased this expensive moisturiser after reading the user's reviews. Bottle lasted for approx two months. The good thing is that it absorbs quickly and keeps the skin hydrated. THE MOST ANNOYING THING IS ITS SMELL. It smells like camphor and irritates the eyes too. Never knew that it comes without fragrance too. Being so expensive, just had to use it to finish. Otherwise I was doing good with my earlier moisturiser just at the one fourth of its price. Giving three stars to the ingredient quality only.
customer_reviews.author: Anirudh Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Finally great skin care for men!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lotion. A little goes a long way. It has a light fresh scent and feels great on my skin. I plan to get their daily Lotion with sunscreen next. Brickell has some helpful videos on their website to help you pick the best regimen for your skin. Also, their free sample kit for $6.95 shipping available on their website is well worth it so you can find out which products are best for you. There products make me feel like I just left a spa treatment!
customer_reviews.author: DocG

customer_reviews.title: great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Like most men, we usually skip this step in the routine or worse use the wrong products like body lotion on our face, but this product corrects all that. As you start to get older moisture becomes more important and I found that this one (the scented version) works really well. I used to use Clinique for men, but this is a better product for the cost. I would recommend you try it and the customer service is great if you have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cazzadich

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Lotion I’ve ever Bought!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried tons of different moisturizers for my face and this by far has been the best. I sometimes am affected by weather, wind etc by my face getting red, irritated but this has pretty much prevented this also my skin tends to be in the oily side. This also helps control that and drys very quickly while lasting pretty much all day. I usually apply morning and night after showering. Definitely recommend this lotion for men.
customer_reviews.author: MC07

customer_reviews.title: Best quality ingredients for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am a sixty six year old guy who didn't want to start looking his age. I searched Amazon for moisturizers and found Brickell Daily Moisturizer. At first I thought it was too expensive, but I saw the reviews and decided to try it. It was money well spent. You only need a drop to moisturize your whole face. I use it daily, usually after a shower. It is non-greasy but very effective in keeping my face feeling clean and fresh. I usually use their face scrub twice a week and along with the moisturizer it leaves my face feeling great.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Y.

customer_reviews.title: A Top Notch Moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I have been mositurizing my face for years now, but still felt like I would get flaky spots on my forehead and nose. I decided to take the leap and try brickells product, even though it was twice the price of my normal moisturizer. Lesson learned! This lotion works so well that I have now started dabbling with other Brickell products. The charcoal face wash and body lotion have become essential to my routine as well! My sister who has very sensitive skin and only uses cruelty free products has now started using this lotion on a daily basis too. Maybe drop the "men" and just make it Brickell? Thanks for these thoughtful products!
customer_reviews.author: Anders R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I've used a number of moisturizers throughout my time. Each time I change I tend to spend a little more money on it. This product is a bit runny and that concerned me. But, it turns out that it helps me get the product on my evenly and absorbs quickly. I have an oilier skin and this moisturizer hasn't caused any breakouts, or left my face shiny. It's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brad R.

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have never established a facial cleaning habit until now. I have never purchased facial products before so I was a bit timid with my purchases and I was wondering if I was just wasting my money. However the product works. I decided to purchase an exfoliating facial scrub in combination with the charcoal daily facial wash and the lotion and they work great! Even after the first week, my family noticed the difference. I have been using the product for almost a month now and I have no regrets! I am a happy customer and I especially enjoy the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Sung Lee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t absorb well
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try a different brand other than Lab Series after reading reviews. Can’t say that I am happy with it. The lotion has to be rubbed for longer than normal before it absorbs into your skin. For some reason, it doesn’t soak right it which I don’t like. Tried applying on my face and neck after shaving And it burns. At this point I’d rather just put hand lotion on my face. I dunno, I feel like the reviews in their products are bogus. I’ll stick with the Lab series for Men.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but high price and ~avg. dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Great product - have been using it for over 6 months and I like it. A few other reviewers have the same comment I have - solid product, great scent, face feels "taunt" and not oily. Why not 5 star? It is on the runny side, which for the price is surprising. The dispenser is pretty average - if there's a recommended amount (dime size) why not a pump? And price. For $35 I'm still buying it but if any of the competitors improve their products at a better price I'd look at those options.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great product. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: I swim everyday and that dries out my skin. I started using this product and the results are astounding. I had some rough patches on my forehead and within a week they were gone. A little goes a long way. Just a few drops and the coverage is perfect. My face has never felt better and more healthy. I pair this with a little of their anti-aging cream for around my eyes and forehead creases. I love this company’s products.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Diedrich

customer_reviews.title: A very good all purpose moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: A very good all purpose moisturizer. Spreads well so you don't need to use too much, and works well for my normal/combination skin type. They offer both a scented (which I find is a tiny bit strong/unpleasant at times but not at all unbearable) and an unscented version. -------------- As a side note, Brickell does offer customers 50% off in exchange for Amazon reviews. Maybe this is something to keep in mind when reading other reviews of Brickell's products. I still think they offer very good products, especially for those just starting to get into skincare, and just potentially a tiny bit overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend, and he absolutely loves it! His skin looked better right away, and he said he is going to continue to buy it because he likes it so much. My only semi-complaint is that it is not completely scent free as stated. It has a slight smell when first applied, which kind of reminds me of oatmeal, but it dissipates quickly. My boyfriend did not like the smell at first, but now he said he actually likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Lovely moisturizer with all natural ingredients that is great for sensitive skin types.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! Finding the perfect moisturizer for my skin has been such a pain, but I finally think I found one worth buying again. This moisturizer is light on the skin, gets absorbed almost instantly, and has a pleasant scent to it. I have eczema and rosacea on my face, and this product doesn't react with any of the prescription topical treatments I use. My only complaint is that I only get to apply it twice a day! This product has changed the way I feel about my skin, provides me the necessary moisture my high-maintnence skin requires, and uses all natural ingredients. I love Brickell and can't wait to try all of their products!
customer_reviews.author: Cody McNeal

customer_reviews.title: Brickell the best mens moisturizer in the market
customer_reviews.text: Ive used many face moisturizers throughout my years. I honestly can say this by far is the best ive wver used. Just a little dab in your palm and rubbed onto your face does the job. Keeps my skin looking healthy without the shine some of the other moisturizers I've used. Im 60yrs old and always gwt compliments about how young i look. Thanks to BRICKELL
customer_reviews.author: Sal Aronica

customer_reviews.title: still feel a little oily around my nose
customer_reviews.text: I use it as night cream after bath and the area around my nose feel oily after I apply the moisturizer. I guess it's due to aloe base ingredient. I think I will go back to Shea butter base product after this bottle. Another down side is hard to control the amount I need and I often squeeze to much consider this bottle is quite expensive.
customer_reviews.author: GMan

customer_reviews.title: Fell short the second time
customer_reviews.text: I bought the face moisturizer (scented) and several other products from their website before and loved the product. I recently bought a second bottle of face moisturizer (unscented) and this feels like a totally different product. The moisturizer is so sticky that I have to wash my hands after applying it to my face. My face gets oily and after about a week of using it my face is breaking out, which rarely happens to me. Its a shame the quality went down so soon, I was a fan of their product and previously bought everything from pomade, hair shampoo/conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer meets the quality I have come to expect from this company. I live in the snowy northlands and so far it’s kept my face supple and smooth despite the exposure to high, dry winds. Although the price point gave me pause before my purchase, with this product a little goes a long way. This could be the result of my low face-skin-to-beard-ratio, but I’m happy to report that the little bottle has lasted more than three months. It also works into my beard without leaving after-grease like some cheaper products I have used in the past. It smells great and I love the tingle.
customer_reviews.author: MB_C

customer_reviews.title: My face has never felt better.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was smaller than I expected, but this lotion goes a long way. I use it once a day (in the mornings, after I shower). Just a dime size covers my entire face. I've had the bottle for 2 months now, and I'm only half way through it. So it's definitely worth the price! The lotion itself is very high quality. It doesn't leave a greasy feel, and it prevents my face from feeling dry. I'm looking forward to trying the scented version as my next bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: The Best Daily Face Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have tried MANY face moisturizers over the years. I have a very oily "T-Zone" and the rest of my face is dry so I have had a hard time finding the right moisturizer. I really really like this moisturizer for several reasons. A little goes a long way - this bottle will last me probably two or more months. It has a cooling effect which is just a great way to start your day. It moisturizes without leaving me greasy. It immediately soaks into my skin so I don't look shiny, just healthy and hydrated. I honestly can't recommend this enough. It is THE BEST. I bought the travel size as well so I will never be without it.
customer_reviews.author: R Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a natural daily moisturiser, and after much research stumbled upon this product. I was initially wary given the price was more than I would normally spend, but I bit the bullet and haven’t looked back. First of all, you only need a small amount of moisturiser meaning the bottle lasts me 2-3 months. Secondly, the product is well worth the price; it leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated (minus the shine!). Better quality than your mainstream brands, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J Blez

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting more from a 35$ little bottle
customer_reviews.text: Good - moisturizing and fragance free as advertised Not so good - texture is creamy and there is definitely oil in there Bad - the plastic bottle feels clumsy - dispenser head is way too crappy for a 35$ bottle Overall, im disappointed - this product is not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K.

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I'll preface this review by saying that I did not have a regular skin care routine prior to purchasing this moisturizer, so it's hard to compare its effectiveness to other brands. But, I've been using this product (along with a facial cleanser and face scrub, also from Brickell) for several weeks, and I feel like it's worked well so far. I've had issues with dry skin for a while, but this moisturizer has helped alleviate that problem. The only knock is the price. Fortunately, as someone sporting lengthy stubble or a beard most of the time, the area of my face clear for application is smaller, which will hopefully extend the life of this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that has helped the dry skin on my forehead and top of my bald head during the summer. Other products would work well for the day, but it never helped my skin long term. After only a week of use, my skin stays moisturized and you can't even feel or see the dryness anymore! Very impressed. Made me want to try other Brickell products.
customer_reviews.author: MoHenny

customer_reviews.title: Hydration with no shine!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this moisturizer for a little over a year. It’s the first moisturizer I’ve stuck with and the one I keep coming back to if I try something else. The biggest plus for is that it absorbs well and doesn’t make my face look shiny or greasy. Many moisturizers claim they won’t make you shiny, but you try them and then they do. This one actually absorbs well, yet is hydrating. I told a friend about this moisturizer and he now uses it consistently as well. If you’ve been looking for a men’s moisturizer that works and doesn’t make you shiny this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: aquastorm

customer_reviews.title: I have dry skin... this does nothing for me
customer_reviews.text: Says it has no smell, but it does, not unpleasant but it does still have one. I have dry skin on my forehead, eyebrows, and the sides of my nose, and putting this on my face does nothing to moisturize those area's at all. Tried using twice a day for 2 weeks but had to go back to my old stuff (no longer available on Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: InTheKnow

customer_reviews.title: It's just like that super cheap stuff they give away in hotels
customer_reviews.text: This is no better than the generic stuff they give away in hotels. Feels thin and smells like a bunch of random scents combined. For the price I could get some more legit moisturizer than feels luxurious and doesn't smell like a cheap hotel room. I'm throwing mine away.
customer_reviews.author: T. Denyer

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this facial moisturizer. It is light, refreshing, has a nice mint/tea smell that reminds you of a spa. Really keeps moisture on my face throughout the day and using this in combination with the face wash definitely improved my complexion. I have a tendency towards oily skin so it definitely complimented it well. Brickell also is a great company too with excellent customer servic le. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a moisturizer that doesn't irritate my skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a moisturizer (as well as other facial products) that does what it is supposed to do and does not irritate my skin. The Brickell line of products all live up to what the intent of the products are. The moisturizer is gentle and effective. After washing my face with their various cleanses, I use the moisturizer along with their other products and my skin has never looked better!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna/Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with Brickell's Face Moisturizer. The bottle seems very small upon arrival but it's only necessary to use a pea size dollop of the product to completely cover your face and neck. I have the scented variety and I like it. Do I look 20 years younger.....not yet but it the moisturizer does help.
customer_reviews.author: Gibby

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This isn't an all natural moisturizer that will give your skin what it wants. This is another of those over-constructed, sits-on-the-surface, doesn't-serve-the-purpose products.
customer_reviews.author: Braedon

customer_reviews.title: Goes on easy dont need much
customer_reviews.text: Its suggested to put ion before the moistureizer. The face wash is refreshing and i suppose the properties in it combined with using the moisturizer help complete the ritual. I think a good soap could do the same bit Il”lll follow the suggestion to ise with the other products i use from brickellk with it. Mind you its only been less than a month Im using the products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I recently started using Brickell products after trying to find a moisturizer I could use on my face and head after shaving that wouldn't cause painful breakouts. This moisturizer is fantastic. I don't like scented lotions, so I grabbed the unscented version and am very pleased. It has a slight baby powder smell but the smell is faint and doesn't linger on the skin after applying. It only requires a pea-sized amount to cover my entire face. It goes on nice and thin, absorbs/dries quickly, and doesn't leave an oily residue. Can't say enough good things about their product line.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bliznik

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves the smell and I feel the difference
customer_reviews.text: I have never used any sort of face wash or moisturizer, but I recently turned thirty and decided it might be fine to start taking care of my skin. My wife and I enjoy the smell of the daily moisturizer and my skin feels firmer and less oily. I’ve been enjoyed this product so much that I have also purchased Brickell’s clarifying gel face wash, as well as, taking advantage of their free sample pack (I highly recommend doing the same).
customer_reviews.author: Travis Boss

customer_reviews.title: Smells like wet hay
customer_reviews.text: Not at all impressed with the quality of this product, especially when compared to products that cost a fraction of this. In addition, the stuff just plain stinks, it smells like wet hay. I guess they figure this is some sort of manly out door sent, but I didn't like putting it on my face. If it were unscented it would have been marginal at best.
customer_reviews.author: Cascade

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! Good Starting Point For A Daily Routine!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who had not previously put a premium on skin care - I've finally reached a tipping point and decided to invest in and prioritize my daily skin care. I had read other reviews for Brickell's products and after purchasing the Daily Essential Faice Moisturizer, I was hooked. I use this product daily and have seen a noticeable difference in my complexion and do not ever have an oily feeling from the moisturizer which I've hated with other brands. I've since bought other Brickell products (face mask, eye balm, anti-aging) and can confirm they've all been worth the price and make a noticeable difference in how you look and in-turn feel!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shane Hoss

customer_reviews.title: Great first-time moisturizer to try out if you've never used moisturizer before
customer_reviews.text: This was the first moisturizer I ever bought for my face, and I couldn't have been any luckier to choose this one! The minty smell really helps to wake up your face in the morning and keep you going throughout the day. At the same time, the natural ingredients help alleviate your face and aid in healthier production of oils on your skin throughout the day. Really love this product for both its quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: Thinh Vu

customer_reviews.title: This by far one of the best daily moisturizers out there
customer_reviews.text: This by far one of the best daily moisturizers out there. I found Brickell through Men's Journal and thought I would give them a try...and I'm happy I did. I am very active and spend a lot of time outdoors, and I've always struggled to find a good face moisturizer to keep up. Brickell Daily Essential Face Moisturizer does a perfect job - great smell, not oily, doesn't irritate my skin or cause breakouts, and has been a big help to the skin on my face. Will continue to be a repeat customer
customer_reviews.author: Ben R.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly have never written a reveiw about a moisturizer before but this one, to me, is on another level. It's difficult with moisturizing products for men to check most of the boxes. This one by Brickell feels great, has a subtle, natural scent and helps my skin recover from the day. Living in a southern state with heat and sun exposure does it's fair share of damage. This moisturizer gives my face the nourishment it needs with high quality ingredients at an affordable price. Can't say enough great things about it. Nice work Brickell! Thank you for formulating such a high quality moisturizer for men.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Feuer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality moisturizer for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a god quality daily use moisturizer that wouldn't break the bank. This product fit the bill perfectly. A liitle bit goes a long way. Pleasant scent, a bit strong but not overpowering. After just a few days of daily use my face really felt softer. I'm using this with Brickell revitalizing anti-aging cream at night and clarifying face wash twice daily. Best part: I have business associate that I generally only see once a year. At our Christmas luncheon a few weeks ago he commented "you know, you just seem to get younger every year ..." I have to give some credit to Brickell!
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Daily Moisturizer with Natural Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Love the moisturizer - does exactly as expected and is light, non-greasy, and great for my sensitive skin. My only small qualm is that the unscented version (which I ordered) still has a slight scent upon application, although that doesn't last after a few minutes. I switched from another face moisturizer I used for many years but wanted something with natural ingredients, which Brickell focuses on with their entire line. Plus, their customer support and communication is excellent. Highly recommend the product!
customer_reviews.author: KG in BK

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good facial moisturizer that doesn’t clog pores as I deal with adult acne from time to time. I tried a few that were not for me until I came across this product. Don’t let the small bottle and price deter you. You only need a tiny amount and it easily spreads across your entire face. It is very light but still keeps my face moisturized all day! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michald Cupp

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for the price, very small
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this product it’s not worth it, the bottle is cheap and super small, the smell is heavy on the tea tree oil, not greasy but it doesn’t do any miracles either, There’s cheaper alternatives that work way better For men than this tiny little bottle that works like any other Regular moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Bullseye
customer_reviews.text: I love and have tried most Brickell products. I was looking for a men's grooming brand that did not use parabens/phthalates and I was happy to discover this company. The best part is they have a pretty extensive skin care line so I'm grateful for the one-stop shopping. The moisturizer is particularly good because it is lightweight (I abhor a greasy lotion) and it really provides a nice invigorating feeling for the skin with a pleasant tingle. I also appreciate that it is available unscented, which I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: This is good stuff! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It's light, very absorbent and non greasy. I really do love this stuff and you only need a teeny tiny amount to cover your entire face. I workout a lot and one of my biggest gripes with moisturizers is that when I sweat, it combines with the moisturizer and drips down my face and gets in my eyes and well... it stings. This was not the case with Brickell's. I have used this since October and have been very pleased with the results. Dean Shortland
customer_reviews.author: Dean Shortland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Everyday Face Moisturizer for Men
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Goes on very easily and does not leave the face looking greasy or anything. A small amount goes a long way too. My face feels moisturized the whole day. Much better than mass produced products like cetaphil and others. I would definitely recommend this product to guys who's face tends to dry out in the cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: CLTMarc

customer_reviews.title: I didn't love this
customer_reviews.text: I didn't love this moisturizer. I usually prefer a gel moisturizer, but I thought I try something different. Unfortunately, the texture of the product is a bit odd, and it almost feels as if it leaves a film on my face/hands. I usually can't wait to wash it off my hands after applying. In addition, I don't feel like it actually moisturized my face. The packaging is fine, but the bottle invited you to squeeze out way more than you need way too easily. The smell isn't bad, but it also isn't great. Needless to say, I won't be purchasing this moisturizer again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a moisturizer that works with my skin for a while, trying various high and mid level products. Any products that contain alcohol hurt my skin more than help and I end up with red patches. Any thing too heavy or thick and I immediately sweat it off. This product keeps my skin feeling soft and healthy all day without making me sweat. It takes a very small amount, between a dime and nickel size, to cover my face and neck. I use the scented version as the oils do more than just give off a scent and the smell goes away quickly. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the pricetag
customer_reviews.text: I love this face moisturizer. It is lightweight and doesn't leave my face or hands feeling at all greasy after application. The scent is nice without being overpowering or too perfume-y. My face tends to be on the oily side and this moisturizer does not exacerbate that problem like others have. The price tag is steep, but on par with other high-quality skin care products and the bottle is pretty sizable. Will definitely order again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Redness and dryness gone
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review for the facial cleanser and this one is no difference. Total game Changer and I use this as a after shave lotion as well. I had dry ares on my cheeks and redness and this moisturizer has cleared it up completely. Again, I have use the high end products like Kiehls and they did not have this kind of impact on my skin. It is such a relief to have found something that works and works without all the harsh ingredients. Again, game changer!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C.

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer for men
customer_reviews.text: It’s WORTH the price guys!!! A little bit goes a long way! I’ve tried so many moisturizers that don’t actually moisturize lol, this one works. I got the scented one. It not only does its job but makes you feel refreshed. I wish I never cheaped out and got the small version. But it’s still a win since it’s a travel size.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Essential Part of Skin Care Routine
customer_reviews.text: I started with their Sampler Set from their website and was so pleased with the results. Since then I've been slowly adding more of their products to my daily skin care routine. I typically use this in the morning after I've washed with the Charcoal Face Wash. This product leaves skin feeling refreshed and hydrated - does not feel oily at all and has a really nice scent. I understand most men can feel lost when it comes to skin care but they have very easy to understand guides to help meet whatever specific needs you have - will definitely be buying more of their line.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: not really worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is expensive moisturizer.. It seems to leave a hardened "residue" that you can rub off your face after it dries. You'd think for this price, it wouldn't do that. It smells nice, yes. The consistency is a very watery lotion and tends to drip easily.
customer_reviews.author: BGZ

customer_reviews.title: The best face moisturizer I've used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lotion based on the recommendation of a friend and I've been in love ever since. It absorbs very quickly in my skin and doesn't leave my face feeling overly greasy and heavy. I like that you don't a lot of it to cover your entire face because it's that light. Honestly, I have no complaints for and highly recommend. I've even started venturing into their other products (face wash & eye cream) and I equally enjoy them as well. Also, the scent isn't overbearing and it all natural & organic if that's something that matters to you.
customer_reviews.author: Thaddeus Mims

customer_reviews.title: My daily face lotion
customer_reviews.text: After trying the sampler pack on Brickell's site, I quickly fell in love with this moisturizer - had to order more. The ingredients are very light on your skin, moisturizing without leaving a shine. I apply in the morning and at night and don't ever experience a 'cakey' feeling on my face. The smell, while pleasant, doesn't linger. It's only enough to let you know you're putting lotion on. Only downside I can think of is that if you're in very windy, dry conditions, you may have to reapply. Overall, I love this face lotion and continue to use it everyday as a light moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Dee A

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin feeling tight, a bit dry
customer_reviews.text: I have combo skin, dry yet oily. Finding moisturizers that don't leave my skin looking greasy is a chore. This is definitely a matte finish but leaves my skin feeling dry and tight. I have used and will be trying other Brickell products but this one is a pass for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Product line.
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of many Brickell Men's products. I have very sensitive skins and have always been mindful of what ingredients I put on to my face. I had gone many years since my teens without a skin routine I was happy with. The price for these products is worth it compared to a lot of other pricier options. I recommend getting their sample of their product line up from the website to see what you might want from the wide array of options.. I use the men's charcoal face wash and the daily moisturizer after the shower. As I move into my 30s I'm sure I will be using their eye balms as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Davis

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to buy the Unscented version!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize there was an option for scented/unscented. My fault for not paying attention. The moisturizer works great so I will still give 5 stars, I will just be sure to order the unscented version next time. Overall, my skin has felt significantly more smooth and less oily than my previous moisturizer I had been using. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: yolo

customer_reviews.title: Great, lightweight mosturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this mosturizer. It's nice and light, which is a huge plus for me as I have oily skin. I have the scented, which is really refreshing, especially in morning. The cooling effect from the eucalyptus and peppermint oils really help to wake you up. A little bit goes a long way, so it really only takes the dime sized amount that the instructions call for. I used it twice a day at first, but have gone down to once a day as I recently purchased the anti-aging cream that I use at night. Will definitely buy more Brickell products and more of this mosturizer when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: William Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Moisturizer for Every Day Use
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to use in combination with other Brickell products, to try and combat oily skin issues on my face, and after using for around 2 weeks, my skin looks and feels great! I use this every morning after the Purifying Charcoal Face Wash, and follow it up with the restoring eye cream. This has really helped my skin to feel moisturized without leaving an oily feel. In my experience, I would recommend for people with naturally oily skin. If you have not used Brickell products before, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher F

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: My skin is prone to irritation if it gets excessively dry. Most moisturizers actually make this worse, causing even more redness and irritation. Enter this product. It’s light, but extremely hydrating. It’s about as natural as you can get, which is also awesome. You only need a very small amount, so it lasts forever. I can’t begin to express how much I appreciate this product. Try the others products also. The face wash is also excellent for not drying out your skin. These products are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: W Norris

customer_reviews.title: ... for a year and they are some of the best man products I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Brickell products for a year and they are some of the best man products I have ever used. I use the shampoo, conditioner and body wash, they have a great woody, leather scent. I like the products so much that i just recently started using their face and ant aging stuff. I do wish they would make travel size products as I travel a lot and can never find Brickell in the countries I travel in.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!!! A top of the line natural product for dudes!
customer_reviews.text: Let’s face it (pun intended) 😏... men and women just don’t have the same skin chemistry. I’ve been looking for years for a natural moisturizer that doesn’t clog my pores and is good for sensitive oily skin. This is the one! Great as after shave and daily moisturizer. Keep it up Brickell!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Shinn

customer_reviews.title: Simply works and non greasy
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin on my nearly bald head. I’ve tried several different lotions and they are all either too greasy, heavy, or simply don’t work and within minutes after application, flaking and dry skin comes right back. If it doesn’t, my head feels like a greasy mess. Brickell Men’s daily essential face moisturizer goes on light, non greasy and simply works. Awesome product line.
customer_reviews.author: Jason White

customer_reviews.title: You shouldn't put peppermint in facial skin moisturizers.
customer_reviews.text: Unscented version is great. Scented version burns my facial skin. I have loved the unscented version for a while now and accidentally got the scented version. Huge mistake. Within a minute of applying my facial skin was red and burning. Be warned that the scented version contains peppermint, which you definitely don't want on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Charlton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.!
customer_reviews.text: Every product Brickell makes is awesome. I have purchased them all and recommend every one of them.
customer_reviews.author: dmike36

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I started using Brickell's Daily Face Moisturizer as the daytime counterpart the Brickell's Anti-Aging Cream I use at night. My wife (a former Esthetician) was always telling me that I should moisturize my face. Since my skin is oily already, I never thought it was necessary. I tried the Face Moisturizer and it really helps. Not only does it hydrate and put restorative ingredients back into my skin, but it also puts up a protective barrier to help keep dirt and other things in the air from getting into my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: Good for combination skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 6 months now and really like it. I have combination skin and when I get out of the shower my face is super dry and then throughout the course of the day it gets oily in the "T-Zone". I have been looking for a lightweight moisturizer that wouldn't cause my combination skin to break out throughout the course of the day. I stumbled upon this product, and I tried their sampler pack from their website to make sure I would like it. So far, so good! My face seems to be more smooth and it seems to be working quite well!
customer_reviews.author: S. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Not sure after a week
customer_reviews.text: Have been a fan of Pond’s cold cream for several years, so that’s the basis of comparison right now. Like the fact that it’s not greasy and oily at all - flows easily, not too thick. Probably because of this it gets absorbed quickly..... it sure about it’s effectiveness through the day. Has a unique fragrance, not terrible but will try unscemted version next time. I have dry skin, not sure it will work during cold Chicago winters. But could be a good alternative to the more greasy Pond’s option during non-winter months.
customer_reviews.author: rrk

customer_reviews.title: I’ve Found What I Was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been exploring all natural face moisturizers for quite some time, and now I’ve found the product for which I was searching. While the price seemed high for a small container, the density of the lotion only requires a very small amount to adequately cover my face and neck. I love, love, love this lotion and actually look forward to applying it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiburon

customer_reviews.title: Best facial moisturizer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have literally tried 15 or more facial moisturizers without success. That was until I stumbled upon Brickell. While I admit this was one of the highest priced options, it was well worth the price. At 50 years of age I still occasionally get acne breakouts, especially on my forehead. I had been searching for a product that would moisturize my skin but not make it oily or shiny in appearance. Well Brickell fit that bill perfectly. The face moisturizer is light, hydrating, smells great, does not create shine, eliminated the acne issue, and has almost diminished all the age lines on my face. This stuff is nothing short of amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Richmond VA

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: For years I've been using a different brand face and body moisturizer which I loved. Which I started using the Brickell face wash, I decided to try the moisturizer as a combo, but was very dubious. The jury's out... and I love it! It's got a very masculine smell (though they also sell an unscented version which I appreciate) and leaves my face feeling soft but not oily. I am very pleased with this stuff, and bought travel bottles of this and the face wash for when I go on trips.
customer_reviews.author: tinctoris

customer_reviews.title: Great product ,high quality
customer_reviews.text: Living at 6200 feet my skin needs a lot of help,especially in the winter. This face lotion is great as advertised and I would recommend it to my friends and family. If you are sensitive to scented products try the unscented version, as some will find the scent overwhelming. It’s worth a try for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

product_meta.title: Brickell Men's Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Natural and Organic Fast-Absorbing Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, and Jojoba, 4 Ounce, Scented
feature_bullets: What It Does: This light, fast-absorbing oil free facial moisturizer for men is packed with potent natural ingredients. Hydrates, nourishes, renews, and protects your face without clogging pores.

How It Works: Powerful, natural hydrating ingredients quickly soak into the skin to firm and nourish. Green tea and jojoba oil protect the skin from free radicals and damage in this face moisturizer for men.
Who It’s For: Men of any age with any skin type. Men with normal, oily, sensitive, dry, or combo types skin will benefit from this natural men’s face moisturizer.

Who We Are: Brickell creates skincare and grooming products for men using natural & certified organic ingredients. Our products are sold in over 20 countries and have appeared in GQ, Men's Health, Men's Journal, and other popular men’s magazines.
Key Ingredients: Natural & Certified Organic ingredients, including aloe, jojoba oil, vitamin E, hyaluronic acid and green tea. 100% natural, 83% organic.
